item.title: Fixing the Servant
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
Even if that’s true and they’re willing to let the King die, that’s still a much more complicated and costly way to prove a Butler. It takes at least a night, and if the King dies to anything else, the court will have no way of knowing. It’s certainly much better than the current system where the king is instantly informed of if it was a Butler or an Assassin the moment they’re poisoned.

item.title: Fixing the Servant
item.dc:creator: Chocolate
item.description:
Butler claims are always asked to poison the king to confirm their identities (if there is a physician or alchemist). This might help Servants not be stuck in that rut.

-Butler changes: The Butler will not commit suicide if he poisons a Blue Dragon King. The Butler will not see if his target was occupy immune
-King changes: Poison notification for the King is changed to “You were poisoned!”

Servant

Goal: Unseen Win Con
Passive: Dutiful: Immune to Occupy and Target Changing

Day Ability: Assassin’s Favor 1 use: Silently ask the Assassin to poison the King with a special mix ,taking one use of Nightshade. This causes the King to die in one night if not healed by a Physician or an Alchemist. [If the Assassin already poisoned the King, this can still be used to make them die faster]

Notifications for the Assassin

Pop-Up: "The Servant asked to borrow one use of nightshade, in order to deliver a powerful poisoning to the King. Will you do it? Yes/No

Servant Notifications

You asked the Assassin to borrow some Nightshade

The Assassin gave you his Nightshade. The King is poisoned and will die in one day!

The Assassin declined to give you his nightshade.

Pop-Up: The Assassin poisoned the King! You can use your charge of Assassin’s favor to make the King die sooner! Will you do it? Yes/No

Comments: yes, this also can be used to empower the Assassin’s nightshade wine for use on the King. Basically like the Enforcer’s frenzy. I like that it can be used to both prevent confirming Butlers AND this.

Day Ability 2: Off-Brand Wine 1 use: Give the King wine that tastes “funny”. He will believe he was poisoned by the Butler. Potential Healers and the King will get heal notifications if they interact. If the King is NOT healed, he will still receive a heal notification

Comments: (just as a loose end. Basically a form of the Herbalist’s drug. an Option. Might not work without a willing partner to play along, but it is a last resort if the Assassin is out of nightshade.)

Night Ability 1: Serve Wine: Occupy a target player by getting them drunk.
Night Ability 2: Concentrated Wine: Throw a party at your house, occupying all visitors
